directions: Add water, oil, brown sugar, bread flour, gluten flour, milk powder, mixed spice, and yeast into the bread machine pan in the order suggested by the manufacturer.  Select Fruit setting or the setting for Basic White Bread.  Press Start.
If your machine has a Fruit setting, add the golden raisins and peel at the signal, or around 5 minutes before the kneading cycle has finished.
ingredients: 2 ⅔ tablespoons candied mixed fruit peel
title: Fruit Loaf
